scripts.build:web: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force .\www | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path .\index.html -Destination .\www\index.html -Force; Copy-Item -Path .\app.js -Destination .\www\app.js -Force; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force .\www\estilos | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path .\estilos\style.css -Destination .\www\estilos\style.css -Force"
scripts.android:sync: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android
